Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Square class. It contains all functions used for piece movement over squares. All square properties are defined here.

    • Constructor Summary

      • Square

        public Square(javax.swing.ImageIcon color,
              int xPosition,
              int yPosition,
              int arrayPosition,
              java.lang.String pieceType)
        Square constructor
        Parameters:
        color - is the color of the square
        xPosition - is the x position of the square
        yPosition - is the y position of the square
        arrayPosition - position of square in the square array
        pieceType - piece type of piece on square

    • Method Detail

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(Square square,
                   Board board,
                   java.lang.String turnPieceType)
        Move piece to a selected square and determine whether piece can perform multiple jumps. Force player to make a second jump if multiple jumps are available.
        Parameters:
        square - square object which piece moves to
        board - board object
        turnPieceType - piece type of piece which moves next
